properties.areaDesc: St. Joseph, MI; Elkhart, IN; Branch, MI
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 20 at 11:07PM EST until January 22 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Northern Indiana
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a
Flood Warning for the following rivers...

Saint Joseph River Michigan at Three Rivers affecting Elkhart...
Branch and St. Joseph Counties

.Recent heavy rains in addition to very cold temperatures since Saturday have caused ice to form on the St Joeseph River near Three Rivers. Given the prevailing cold temperatures and fluxuations of the river stages due to ice formation on the river, subsequent updates are likely.

The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Saint Joseph River Michigan at Three Rivers
* until Wednesday morning.
* At 11 PM Monday the stage was 7.2 feet and rising.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 7.0 feet.
* Forecast...The river will rise to crest near 7.4 feet around  1 AM
Tuesday January 21 and fall below flood stage around 11 AM Tuesday
January 21.
* At 7.0 feet...Expect minor flooding of the Scidmore Park picnic
facilities in Three Rivers.
* This crest compares to a previous crest of 7.0 feet which occurred
on May 31 2011.
properties.instruction:
Never drive vehicles through flooded areas. The water may be too deep
to allow safe passage. Never allow children to play in or near flood
waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or local media for further
statements and updated forecasts.

Detailed river forecasts and more information can be found on the
internet at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes.

All times are in Eastern Time. This statement will be updated in
about 24 hours or sooner if necessary.
